title: More than tech: How Lowe's India is building and strengthening capabilities in Business Services! - YourStory
content: More than tech: How Lowe's India is building and strengthening capabilities in Business Services!  YourStory
description: How does Lowe's India ensure that their associates are routinely growing? Reena Sofiya, Senior Director - Merchandising, Marketing and Supply Chain at Lowe's India tells us how.
